title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.13 - Sampling and analytical requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.13 - Sampling and analytical requirements

State Regulations

The supplier of water shall collect raw water samples at a frequency prescribed by the State and analyze such samples for contaminants using an approved method, with method exceptions as listed in the tables in section
5-1.52
of this Subpart, and by an approved laboratory as described in section
5-1.74
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.13

Amended

New

York State Register January 17, 2018 /Volume XL, Issue 03, eff. 1/17/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
